long_description: The Garmin VIRB handlebar mount attaches your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your bike or any large tube to capture your entire adventure. Use the thick or thin insert to lock it firmly in place. Accommodates tube diameters from 0.75 to 1.5 in.; mount can be used on handlebars, seat posts, roll bars and more. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: The Garmin VIRB handlebar mount attaches your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to your bike or any large tube to capture your entire adventure. Use the thick or thin insert to lock it firmly in place.
